item.description:
NOTE: This version has significant changes to Conflict Solver, please backup your existing mod collections before running conflict solver. Save game compatibility is not guaranteed.
RELEASE NOTES: * Fix handling of game paths for vanilla definitions
CHANGES FROM v1.18: * Update dependencies * Various fixes * Add mod search filtering syntax * Stellaris parser type recognition updates * Add single merge folder type handling for Stellaris * Fix #304 * Many conflict solver handling improvements
